active_skill.name: Lavish Spending
active_skill.description:
Strikes the target with a barrage of golden coins, dealing Physical DMG and accumulating Physical Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier: 8.3%*140

Daze Multiplier: 4.8%*140

Cooldown 22s

additional_ability.name: Luck is a Component of Power
additional_ability.description:
When there are 2 or more Physical Attribute characters in your squad: Active Skill inflicts 40% more Anomaly Buildup.
Active Skill's continuous strikes duration is increased by 1.6s.
